class.name: iitgn_controllers/JointVelocityController
class.description: Joint Velocity Controller for IITGN robots to command velocity on joints.

class.name: iitgn_controllers/JointPositionController
class.description: Joint Position Controller for IITGN robots to command position on joints.

class.name: iitgn_controllers/CartesianVelocityController
class.description: Cartesian Velocity Controller for IITGN robots to command velocity in Cartesian space.

class.name: iitgn_controllers/ImpedanceController
class.description: IITGN Impedance Controller for Franka Emika robots with multiple impedance control modes

class.name: iitgn_controllers/GripperTopicController
class.description: Topic-based gripper controller for Franka robots

class.name: iitgn_controllers/GripperWidthController
class.description: Gripper controller that sends grasp or move action based on width.

class.name: iitgn_controllers/MoveToStartController
class.description: Move to start controller that moves the robot to a predefined start position.
